description.zh-cn: 中国中医师，中西医结合心血管病专家，天津中医药大学第一附属医院主任医师，中国共产党党员。曾获“国医大师”称号。
description.en: A Chinese traditional medicine practitioner, an expert in integrating traditional Chinese and Western medicine for cardiovascular diseases, and a chief physician at the First Affiliated Hospital of Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine. He was a member of the Communist Party of China and was awarded the title of 'National Master of Chinese Medicine'.

description.zh-cn: 中国旧县名，位于直隶省（今河北省），是阮士怡的出生地。
description.en: A former county in China, located in Zhili Province (modern-day Hebei), the birthplace of Ruan Shiyi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，阮士怡的逝世地。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China, where Ruan Shiyi passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国抗日战争全面爆发的事件，该事件导致阮士怡中断了在北京大学工学院的学业。
description.en: An event that marked the beginning of the full-scale Second Sino-Japanese War, which led Ruan Shiyi to abandon his studies at the College of Engineering, Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学的医学教育机构，阮士怡于1944年在此毕业。
description.en: The medical school of Peking University, from which Ruan Shiyi graduated in 1944.

description.zh-cn: 日籍教授，阮士怡在北京大学医学院的研究生导师。
description.en: A Japanese professor who was Ruan Shiyi's graduate supervisor at Peking University Medical College.

nodes.id: 天津中医药大学第一附属医院

zh-cn: 天津中医药大学第一附属医院
en: First Affiliated Hospital of Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的医院，阮士怡是其建院参与者之一并长期在此担任主任医师。
description.en: A hospital in Tianjin where Ruan Shiyi participated in its founding and served as a chief physician for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动，期间阮士怡曾一度停止工作。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, during which Ruan Shiyi was forced to stop working for a period.

en: Tianjin Institute of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的中医研究机构。
description.en: A traditional Chinese medicine research institute located in Tianjin.

zh-cn: 中国中西医结合研究会
en: China Association of the Integration of Traditional and Western Medicine

description.zh-cn: 中国全国性的中西医结合学术性社会团体。
description.en: A national academic social organization for the integration of traditional Chinese and Western medicine in China.

nodes.id: 天津市卫生健康委员会

zh-cn: 天津市卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 天津市人民政府的组成部门，负责卫生健康工作。其前身天津市卫生局曾授予阮士怡“天津市名中医”称号。
description.en: A department of the Tianjin Municipal People's Government responsible for health and wellness. Its predecessor, the Tianjin Municipal Health Bureau, awarded Ruan Shiyi the title of 'Tianjin Famous Doctor of Traditional Chinese Medicine'.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国政府部门评选的、授予中医药专家的荣誉称号及获得该称号的专家群体。
description.en: An honorary title awarded to experts in traditional Chinese medicine selected by government departments of the People's Republic of China, and the group of experts who have received this title.

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的医院，阮士怡曾在此担任内科住院医师。
description.en: A hospital in Tianjin where Ruan Shiyi once worked as a resident physician in internal medicine.

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的医院，阮士怡曾在此担任内科主治医师。
description.en: A hospital in Tianjin where Ruan Shiyi once worked as an attending physician in internal medicine.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡出生于直隶省丰南县。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi was born in Fengnan County, Zhili Province.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡于1930年代考入北京大学工学院土木工程系，后因七七事变爆发而放弃学业。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi was admitted to the Department of Civil Engineering, College of Engineering, Peking University in the 1930s, but later abandoned his studies due to the outbreak of the Marco Polo Bridge Incident.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡于1940年考入北京大学医学院，1944年毕业并继续研究生学业。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi was admitted to Peking University Medical College in 1940, graduated in 1944, and continued with his postgraduate studies.

description.zh-cn: 1937年七七事变爆发后，阮士怡被迫放弃了在北京大学工学院的学业。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Marco Polo Bridge Incident in 1937, Ruan Shiyi was forced to abandon his studies at the College of Engineering, Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡在北京大学医学院读研究生时，师从日籍教授火田邦吉。
description.en: During his postgraduate studies at Peking University Medical College, Ruan Shiyi was supervised by Japanese professor Kunikichi Hata.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，阮士怡在天津市第四中心医院担任内科住院医师。
description.en: In 1946, Ruan Shiyi worked as a resident physician in internal medicine at Tianjin Fourth Central Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡曾调入天津市工业局医院（现天津市滨江医院），任内科主治医师。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi was transferred to the Tianjin Industrial Bureau Hospital (now Tianjin Bingjiang Hospital) to serve as an attending physician in internal medicine.

relationships.target: 天津中医药大学第一附属医院

description.zh-cn: 1955年，阮士怡参与了天津市市立中医医院（现天津中医药大学第一附属医院）的建院工作。
description.en: In 1955, Ruan Shiyi participated in the establishment of the Tianjin Municipal Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine (now the First Affiliated Hospital of Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine).

relationships.target: 天津中医药大学第一附属医院

description.zh-cn: 自1955年参与建院起，阮士怡长期在天津中医药大学第一附属医院工作，担任主任医师。
description.en: Since participating in its founding in 1955, Ruan Shiyi worked for a long time at the First Affiliated Hospital of Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, serving as a chief physician.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，阮士怡曾一度停止工作。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ruan Shiyi was forced to stop working for a period.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡曾任天津市中医研究所副所长。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi once served as the Deputy Director of the Tianjin Institute of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 阮士怡曾任中国中西医结合研究会（即中国中西医结合学会）理事。
description.en: Ruan Shiyi once served as a council member of the China Association of the Integration of Traditional and Western Medicine.

relationships.source: 天津市卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 2012年，天津市卫生局（现天津市卫生健康委员会）授予阮士怡“天津市名中医”称号。
description.en: In 2012, the Tianjin Municipal Health Bureau (now Tianjin Municipal Health Commission) awarded Ruan Shiyi the title of 'Tianjin Famous Doctor of Traditional Chinese Medicine'.

description.zh-cn: 2014年7月，阮士怡获第二届“国医大师”称号。
description.en: In July 2014, Ruan Shiyi was awarded the title of the second 'National Master of Chinese Medicine'.
